definition: according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before
to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

sentences.english: Working women in China are entitled to a paid maternity leave of 90 days.
sentences.chinese: 女职工可享受产假，为期90天，工资照付。

sentences.english: We shall always negotiate never pay the full asking price.
sentences.chinese: 我们每次都讨价还价，从来不照付全价。

sentences.english: Though you have lost the lawsuit, I would still pay the full price you charged.
sentences.chinese: 虽然官司输了，但是你的律师费要照付。

sentences.english: Will their salary be paid until they no longer desire it?
sentences.chinese: 是否直到他们都不想要薪水了，薪水还是会照付呢？

sentences.english: "I will pay it," said the mother. "I have eighty francs.
sentences.chinese: “我照付就是，”那母亲说，“我有八十法郎。

sentences.english: Certainly, but you will have to pay for it as usual.
sentences.chinese: 可以，不过您在这期间要照付房费。

definition: to pay in advance/to get payment in advance
to pay in full/to pay all of a bill/to pay off
to follow the rules/to do as instructed/to play by the book/to comply with a request
